data.actual_result: Pips appear on servers where no new messages have been sent/ pips do not go away.
data.expected_result: New message pip will go away when the newest messages have been read/pips won't appear for servers where no messages have been posted.
data.short_description: New message pips don't go away/appear on servers where there is no New message.
data.steps_to_repro: - Install newest Alpha 4.0.6 - load discord - notice new message pips - check the server, notice there's no new message - click over to a different server and notice the new message pip didn't go away.
